channel.title: Basics on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Basics on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Fundamentals of PrestaShop Development PrestaShop was conceived so that third-party modules could easily build upon its foundations, making it an extremely customizable e-commerce software. PrestaShop’s customization is based on three possibilities: Themes, Modules, Overriding. Themes are explored in full in the Designer Guide. Modules and the override system are explored in this Developer Guide, starting with the “Concepts” section below. You can learn more about each in the following chapters:
